author: Luis Cruz
subject: Re: Lupin live action?
body:
> I'm still waiting for that Tsui Hark live Lupin. Apparently, he's doing a 
> cgi Gigantor too. o_o

Has there actually been any news about the live Lupin since this
2 yr. old piece of "news"?

http://www.aint-it-cool-news.com/coolnews/980326/9.html

If so, please provide URL(s).

-- 
Luis A. Cruz
cruzl@ccs.neu.edu
